name: NSFilePromiseProvider
desc: An object that provides a promise for the pasteboard.

items.name: init(fileType: String, delegate: NSFilePromiseProviderDelegate)
items.desc: Initializes a file promise provider for a certain file type.

items.name: var fileType: String
items.desc: The file type of the file promise provider.

items.name: var userInfo: Any?
items.desc: Optional user information to pass to the file promise provider.
